resources.string: This version of Folio is not from the Play Store and will not function.
Unfortunately Folio Pro has stopped. Please tap OK to send this report via email.
You can leave comments about this crash here:
Permission to read files is required
Permission to write files is required
Permission to access your location is required
Permission to get accounts is required by notification service
This enables the desktop sharer which allows sharing links to friends, pages and groups.
Display a floating action button at bottom right of screen.
Customize the navigation drawer by removing items you don\'t use.
This turns on the Folio Toolbar.
Only use the Facebook Bar. Please turn off the Folio Toolbar first.
Prevents default Facebook theme while page is loading. (Not recommended for Jelly Bean devices)
Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
Tap OK to clear Folio\'s data. This will also log you out.

Upgrade to Folio Pro and remove ads, get access to Twitter, get access to sharing links to friends, pages, groups or as a private message. Download files from groups. Access to Folio Pro\'s 41 themes. Frequent updates, and help support development.
Clear Folio\'s data. This will also log you out.
Reduce data usage by removing images.
Tap here to read more about the licences used in Folio.
For launcher icons for Folio Free & Folio Pro. Tap here to purchase Cornie Icons.
For sharing an interest in technology and being patient while daddy worked.
For being supportive and encouraging throughout the past years. Thanks for letting me borrow the laptop.
For their new graph api. Also for their mobile site which is used in Folio.
For AppCompat v7, also for open sourcing your Material Design icons.
Special thanks to Jeff of Happening Studios, for help with Messenger.com code and for pushing me to make Folio better. Swipe is an awesome app pushing innovation of wrappers.
Tap here to see whose helped translate Folio.
Please login to start getting notifications.
Show Folio\'s Notification QuickBar to open a floating window for your favorite network.
Secure Folio with a lock code
Something went wrong, please try logging in again
Permission denied. This action cannot be completed.
Display apps & games at launch that may be of interest to you? Apps & games can be turned off at anytime.

Switch off to open links externally
Enables the desktop sharer and the ability to share links with the FAB. Swipe Folio Pro away from recents to turn on.
Enable translucent navigation. Works only KitKat+ devices with on screen buttons and system support.
